decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - To approve the planning application for a new shop front

Condition : 2 - Non-standard
The street number "156" should be incorporated into the fascia hereby approved.
Condition : 3 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 4 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 5 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority (before the building(s) is/are occupied/used).

Condition : 6 - The access doorway to the shop at 156 Chiswick High Road shall have a minimum clear width of 900mm, a level surface or ramp between the pavement and the floor and a door handle of not more than 1m above ground level.
description: Installation of a new shop front to existing restaurant
